value.title: AWS announces Panorama a device adds machine learning technology to any camera
value.excerpt: AWS has launched a new hardware device, the AWS Panorama Appliance, which, alongside the AWS Panorama SDK, will transform existing on-premises cameras into computer vision enabled super-powered surveillance devices.

value.title: Amazon Brings More Machine Learning to the Contact Center

value.title: Shrinking massive neural networks used to model language
value.excerpt: Deep learning neural networks can be massive, demanding major computing power. In a test of the “lottery ticket hypothesis,” MIT researchers have found leaner, more efficient subnetworks hidden within BERT models.

value.title: India’s up-and-coming AI/ML startups
value.excerpt: AI and analytics startups in India attracted US$762.5 million in funding in 2019, and India is currently the source of 8% of the world’s AI talent. Indeed, the country is in a position to be a major contributor of AI-driven solutions that address various issues not just in India but around the world.

value.title: Deep learning predicts woman's risk for breast cancer

value.title: Apple's ML Compute Framework Accelerates TensorFlow Training
